author: Zrath
title: Awesomest Lego car ever made!
review:
At the time of its release, this was the awesomest minifig car that Lego had ever made! It was small, simple, with a cool new windshield design and working suspension, and it was a TON OF FUN!
 
If a toy manufacturer had sold toy cars like that in different colors and body designs, they would have made a fortune!
The design worked well as is.
The 6335 Indy Transport is another example of that: a Lego design that is so good that it would work great as ready-built toy.

author: lego_octan_guy
title: Great set, and it's octan! (I didn't build it though)
review: I love octan sets and this 1 is great! it has working suspensions, a cool windshield, a nice flag pole, and it has octan on it! It also comes with a nice minifig with a nice torso and a red racing helmet. i rated this 5/5, but i didnt build it so i just put 5 for building experience.
